description: Introduction to the Permission Systems That Scale workshop, covering what you'll learn and build throughout the course.
Understanding the critical difference between authentication (who are you?) and authorization (what can you do?), and why authorization is often the harder problem.
A high-level introduction to RBAC, ABAC, and ReBAC — the three main approaches to authorization — and when to use each one.
Step-by-step instructions to clone the workshop repository, set up the database, and run the demo application.
Understanding the demo application's data model, user roles, and how the UI flows together — the foundation for our permission system work.
